001package Tools;
002
003/*
004 * Closes all open images except the currently active image. 
005 * Much copied from from ij.plugin.WindowOrganizer.java
006 * Wilbur (Feb 2012)
007 */
008
009import ij.ImagePlus;
010import ij.WindowManager;
011import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015public class Close_All_Images implements PlugInFilter {
016        
017        ImagePlus im;
018        
019        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
020                this.im = im;
021                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
022        }
023        
024        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
025                int[] winIds = WindowManager.getIDList();
026                if (winIds == null || winIds.length < 1) {
027                        return;
028                }
029                
030//              if (winIds.length == 1) {
031//                      IJ.error("Only one image is open!");
032//                      return;
033//              }
034                
035                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Close all images");
036                dlg.addCheckbox("Close current image too?", false);
037                dlg.showDialog();
038                if (dlg.wasCanceled())
039                        return;
040                boolean closeCurrentImage = dlg.getNextBoolean();
041                                
042//              int nImages = winIds.length - 1;
043//              YesNoCancelDialog yncd = 
044//                      new YesNoCancelDialog(null, "Close all images", "Close all " + nImages + " images?");
045//              if (yncd.cancelPressed() || !yncd.yesPressed()) {
046//                      return;
047//              }
048                
049                int thisId = this.im.getID();
050                
051                for (int id : winIds) {
052                        if (closeCurrentImage || id != thisId) {
053                                ImagePlus imp = WindowManager.getImage(id);
054                                if (imp != null) {
055                                        imp.close();
056                                }
057                        }
058                }
059        }
060}
061
